name: Dodge Racer
description:
Play Dodge Racer, the race game where you drift your car around an obstacle course trying not to crash or cause a police chase! A drifting game to challenge the fastest reflexes!

- Drift between other cars
- Dodge increasingly narrow obstacles
- Drive over speed boosts to gain momentum
- Outrun police chases

Put the pedal to the metal by playing Dodge Racer now!
